skills.skill: E2E full life cycle SAP MM & WM implementation projects

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide SAP MM & WM support including data modelling, extractions, data staging, loadings, transformations, transportation, and reporting.
Lead or support E2E full life cycle SAP MM & WM implementation projects, including at least 1 with ECC 6.0.
Contribute to production support, and have been part of 2-3 support projects and rollout project cycles.
Expertise in SAP MM and Integration with FI, SD, and PP Module, with hands-on experience.
Demonstrate expert business knowledge on the Planning to Procurement Cycle specific to Pharma industries.
Configure and manage Master Data MRP based Planning for Internal and External Procurement and Inventory Management via Inbound and Outbound Deliveries using Idocs process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (SAP certification a plus)
